name: nfor
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wo(w0, w1))
-| wb(wo(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w1))
-| wnf(s0, wi(wn(w0), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wo(w0, w1))
-| wb(wo(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w1))
-| wnf(s0, wi(wn(w0), w1))

|- wnf(s0, wo(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, wi(wn(w0), w1))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wi(wn(w0), w1))
-| wnf(s0, wn(w0))
-| wnf(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wo(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, wn(w0))
-| wnf(s0, w1)

|- wnf(s0, wo(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wnf(s0, w0)

comment: If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` and ` ps ` , then it is not free in ` ( ph \/ ps ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
